target: Oògùn náà ní àwọn àsèpọ̀ ẹlà alágbára tí ó ní ipa lórí ara.

source: Dyes are chemical compounds that impart color to materials.
target: Aró jẹ́ àwọn àsèpọ̀ ẹlà tí ó fún àwọn ohun èlò ní àwọ̀.

source: The formula shows the chemical composition of the compound.
target: Àpẹẹrẹ náà fi ètò-inú ẹlà ti àsèpọ̀ hàn.

source: The atomic structure determines the chemical properties.
target: Ètò átọmù pinnu àwọn ìṣesí ẹlà.

source: Nitrogen gas makes up most of Earth's atmosphere.
target: Òyì-ilẹ̀ ṣe ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ afẹ́ ayé.

source: Oxygen is necessary for combustion reactions.
target: Òyì-iná jẹ́ dandan fún àwọn àsè jíjóná.

source: The gas laws describe the behavior of gases under different conditions.
target: Àwọn ofin-òyì ṣàlàyé ìṣèwàhù àwọn òyì lábẹ́ àwọn ìdí oníyàtọ̀.

source: The solute dissolves completely in the solution.
target: Gbẹrẹfun tú pátápátá nínú àpòpọ̀.

source: Synthesis reactions combine simple substances to form complex ones.
target: Àwọn àsè ìṣèdá pọ̀ àwọn èdá rọrùn láti ṣẹ̀dá èyí tí ó ṣòro.

source: The chemical reactor maintains optimal conditions for the reaction.
target: Abọ̀-àsè tọ́jú àwọn ìdí tí ó dára jùlọ fún àsè náà.

source: The temperature scale measures the degree of hotness.
target: Ìdíwọn ìgbóná wọ́n ìpò ìgbóná.

source: Alkali metals are stored in oil to prevent reaction with air.
target: A fi àlùrọ aṣọṣẹ pamọ́ nínú epo láti dí àsè pẹ̀lú afẹ́.

source: The reaction of acid with base produces salt and water.
target: Àsè èḳan pẹ̀lú ègbo sun iyọ̀ àti omi.

source: Silicon is a non-metal used in electronic devices.
target: Silika jẹ́ àdàrọ tí a lò nínú àwọn ẹ̀rọ ẹlẹ́tíríìkì.

source: Tin and lead are heavy metals with low melting points.
target: Stania àti ojé jẹ́ àwọn àlùrọ wúwo pẹ̀lú àwọn ojú-iná yíyọ́ tí ó kéré.

source: The breeze carries air pollutants away from industrial areas.
target: Afẹ́rẹ́ gbé àwọn ẹ̀gbin afẹ́ kúrò ní àwọn agbègbè iṣẹ́-ọnà.

source: Fire is a rapid oxidation reaction that produces heat and light.
target: Iná jẹ́ àsè oxidation tí ó yára tí ó ń mú okun-iná àti ìmọ́lẹ̀ jáde.

source: The reaction reaches equilibrium when forward and reverse rates equal.
target: Àsè náà dé agbede nígbà tí àwọn òṣùwọ̀n iwájú àti ẹ̀yìn bá dọ́gba.

source: The heat energy from the reaction can be measured using a calorimeter.
target: A lè wọ́n agbára okun-iná láti àsè náà nípa lílo calorimeter.

source: The gas equation relates pressure, volume, and temperature.
target: Òṃì òyì ṣe àlájọsọ èéfún, àyè, àti ìgbóná.

source: Chemical bonds form when atoms share or transfer electrons.
target: Ìrón ẹlà ṣẹ̀dá nígbà tí àwọn átọmù bá pín tàbí gbé àwọn ẹlẹ́tíróònù lọ.

source: The pressure increases as gas volume decreases.
target: Èéfún pọ̀ bí àyè òyì ṣe dínkù.

source: The chemical reactivity of elements follows periodic trends.
target: Agbára àsè àwọn ìṣù-átọmù tẹle àwọn ìṣàn lákòókò.

source: The chemical structure determines the properties of the compound.
target: Ètò ẹlà pinnu àwọn ìṣesí ti àsèpọ̀.

source: Carbon forms the backbone of organic compounds.
target: Eedu ṣẹ̀dá ẹ̀yìn àwọn àsèpọ̀ eléedú.

source: Sulfur has a characteristic smell when it burns.
target: Imi-ọjọ́ ní òórùn pàtàkì nígbà tí ó bá jó.

source: The chemical formula H₂O represents water.
target: Àpẹẹrẹ ẹlà H₂O dúró fún omi.

source: The reaction between hydrogen and oxygen produces water.
target: Àsè láàrín hydrogen àti òyì-iná mú omi jáde.

source: Copper is a good conductor of electricity.
target: Kopa jẹ́ olùdarí rere ti ẹlẹ́tíríìkì.

source: Iron undergoes corrosion in the presence of oxygen and water.
target: Irin ṣe ìbàjẹ́ ní ojú òyì-iná àti omi.

source: The atomic structure determines how elements react with each other.
target: Ètò átọmù pinnu bí àwọn ìṣù-átọmù ṣe ṣe àsè pẹ̀lú ara wọn.

source: Chemical equations must be balanced by conservation of mass.
target: A gbọ́dọ̀ ṣe ìwọ̀ntúnwọ̀nsì òṃì ̣ẹlà nípa ìtọ́jú ìwọ̀n.

source: The laboratory contains equipment for conducting chemical experiments.
target: Ilé ìmọ-̣jinlẹ ̣ní àwọn ohun èlò fún ṣíṣe àwọn ìdánwò ẹlà.

source: Gold is a noble metal that does not easily react with other elements.
target: Wura jẹ́ àlùrọ ọlọ́lá tí kò ṣe àsè pẹ̀lú àwọn ìṣù-átọmù míràn lófẹ́ẹ́.

source: Physical chemistry studies the physical properties of chemical systems.
target: Èḳó-̣ẹlà t'ìṣeṣí-èdá ̣kọ́ àwọn ìṣesí ara ti àwọn ètò ẹlà.

source: The Gibbs free energy determines the spontaneity of a reaction.
target: Agbára wíwúlò ti Gíbìsì pinnu bóyá àsè kan ṣẹlẹ̀ fúnrararẹ̀.

source: Chemical bonds store energy that can be released during reactions.
target: Ìrọ́n ẹlà tọ́jú agbára tí a lè tú sílẹ̀ lásìkò àwọn àsè.

source: The equilibrium point is where the reaction appears to stop changing.
target: Ibi agbede ni ibi tí àsè náà fihàn láti dá dúró láti yípadà.

source: A complete chemical reaction uses all the reactants.
target: Àsè-ìsèparí ẹlà lo gbogbo àwọn èsè-àsè.

source: Sodium is an alkali metal that reacts vigorously with water.
target: Soda jẹ́ àlùrọ aṣọṣẹ tí ó ṣe àsè lórísírísí pẹ̀lú omi.

source: The shape of molecules determines their chemical properties.
target: Ìrísí àwọn mólékù pinnu àwọn ìṣesí ẹlà wọn.

source: Chemical composition shows the relative amounts of elements in a compound.
target: Ètò ohun-inú ẹlà fihan ìwọ̀n ìbátan àwọn ìṣù-átọmù nínú àsèpọ̀.

source: The enthalpy of a reaction measures the heat transferred at constant pressure.
target: Agbára-Ìrọ́n àsè wọ́n okun-iná tí a gbé kọjá ní èéfún dúródúró.

source: Nuclear reactions involve changes in the nucleus of atoms.
target: Àwọn àsè kóńgbó jẹ mọ́ àwọn ìyípadà nínú inú-kóńgbó àwọn átọmù.

source: Titanium is a strong, lightweight metal used in aerospace.
target: Titania jẹ́ àlùrọ alágbára, fífúyẹ́ tí a lò nínú ẹ̀rọ-òfurufú.

source: Calcium compounds are essential for bone formation.
target: Àwọn àsèpọ̀ kalsia jẹ́ pàtàkì fún ìṣẹ̀dá egungun.

source: Matter exists in three states: solid, liquid, and gas.
target: Èdá wà ní irú-ipò mẹ́ta: adì, aṣàn, àti òyì.

source: A solvent is a substance that dissolves a solute to form a solution.
target: Epo jẹ́ èdá tí ó tú gbẹrẹfun láti ṣẹ̀dá àpòpọ̀.

source: Pressure affects the volume of gases according to Boyle's law.
target: Èéfún ní ipa lórí àyè àwọn òyì gẹ́gẹ́ bí òfin Boyle.

source: Entropy increases in spontaneous processes.
target: Ìdàrú pọ̀ nínú àwọn ìlànà tí ó ṣẹlẹ̀ fúnrararẹ̀.

source: The chemical formula shows the elements present in a compound.
target: Àpẹẹrẹ ẹlà fi àwọn ìṣù-átọmù tó wà nínú àsèpọ̀ hàn.

source: Lead is a toxic heavy metal that can cause health problems.
target: Ojé jẹ́ àlùrọ wíwó oró tí ó lè fa àwọn ìṣòro ìlera.

source: The chemical reactor controls temperature and pressure during reactions.
target: Abọ̀-àsè ṣàkóso ìgbóná àti èéfún lásìkò àwọn àsè.

source: Chemical synthesis is the deliberate creation of chemical compounds.
target: Ìṣèdá ẹlà jé ̣ìlànà tí a mòọ́ ṃò ̣gbà se àsè láti ní èṣún tí a nfé.̣

source: Oxidation reactions involve the loss of electrons.
target: Àwọn àsè oxidation jẹ mọ́ pípàdánù àwọn ẹlẹ́tíróònù.

source: Reduction reactions involve the gain of electrons.
target: Àwọn àsè ìdínkù jẹ mọ́ gbígba àwọn ẹlẹ́tíróònù.

source: The reaction rate depends on temperature and concentration.
target: Òṣùwọ̀n àsè dá lórí ìgbóná àti bí ó ṣe dògidì tó.

source: Catalysts increase reaction rates without being consumed.
target: Àwọn aláàtúnmú pọ̀ òṣùwọ̀n àsè láìjẹ́ pé a lò wọ́n tan.

source: The periodic table organizes elements by their properties.
target: Tábìlì lákòókò to àwọn ìṣù-átọmù gẹ́gẹ́ bí àwọn ìṣesí wọn.

source: A chemical bond is the force that holds atoms together in compounds.
target: Ìrọ́n ẹlà jẹ́ agbára tí ó mú àwọn átọmù jọ pọ̀ nínú àwọn àsèpọ̀.

source: Chlorine is a reactive gas used for water treatment.
target: Òyì-iyọ̀ jẹ́ òyì aláṣe tí a lò fún ìtọ́jú omi.

source: The molar mass of a compound is measured in grams per mole.
target: Ìwọ̀n molar ti àsèpọ̀ jẹ́ wíwọ̀n ní grams fún mole kọ̀ọ̀kan.

source: Magnesia compounds are used in medical antacids.
target: A lo àwọn àsèpọ̀ magnesia nínú àwọn oògùn atúnẹmu-ẹ̀kan.

source: Uranium undergoes nuclear fission to produce energy.
target: Urania ṣe pipin kóńgbó láti ṣe agbára.

source: Chemical kinetics studies the rates of chemical reactions.
target: Èḳó ̣ìyára-ẹlà kọ́ àwọn òṣùwọ̀n àwọn àsè ẹlà.

source: The specific heat capacity of water is unusually high.
target: Agbára okun-iná pàtó ti omi ga ní ọ̀nà àìdáàbò.

source: Francium is the most reactive alkali metal.
target: Fransia jẹ́ àlùrọ aṣọṣẹ tí ó ṣe àsè jù.

source: A mixture can be separated by physical methods.
target: A lè ya àkópọ̀ nípa àwọn ọ̀nà ara.

source: Chemical compounds have fixed compositions.
target: Àwọn àsèpọ̀ ẹlà ní àwọn ètò-inú tí a fidiè sí.

source: Mercury is a liquid metal at room temperature.
target: Mercury jẹ́ àlùrọ aṣàn ní ìgbóná yàrá.

source: Boron compounds are used in detergents.
target: A lo àwọn àsèpọ̀ boron nínú àwọn aṣẹ afọ̀.

source: Silver is less reactive than copper.
target: Fadaka kò ṣe àsè bí kopa.

source: Helium is an inert gas used in balloons.
target: Helia jẹ́ òyì aláìṣàsè tí a lò nínú àwọn bálúù.

source: Phosphorus glows in the dark due to slow oxidation.
target: Phosphorus tànmọ́lẹ̀ nínú òkùnkùn nítorí oxidation lẹ́lẹ́.

source: The chemical industry produces compounds for various uses.
target: Iṣẹ́-ọnà ẹlà ṣe àwọn àsèpọ̀ fún oríṣiríṣi ìlò.

source: Hydrocarbons contain only carbon and hydrogen.
target: Àwọn hydrocarbons ní eedu àti hydrogen nìkan.

source: Oxygen is necessary for cellular respiration.
target: Òyì-iná jẹ́ dandan fún mímí sẹ́ẹ̀lì.

source: The combustion reaction of methane produces carbon dioxide and water.
target: Àsè jíjóná ti methane mú carbon dioxide àti omi jáde.

source: Nitrogen compounds are essential for plant growth.
target: Àwọn àsèpọ̀ òyì-ilẹ̀ jẹ́ pàtàkì fún ìdàgbàsókè ọ̀gbìn.

source: Chemical weathering breaks down rocks through chemical reactions.
target: Àṣẹlẹ̀ ẹlà fọ́ àwọn àpáta nípa àwọn àsè ẹlà.

source: The gas laws describe how gases behave under changing conditions.
target: Àwọn ofin-òyì ṣàlàyé bí àwọn òyì ṣe hùwà lábẹ́ àwọn ìdí tí ń yípadà.

source: Zinc and copper form the alloy brass.
target: Zinc àti kopa ṣẹ̀dá àyọpọ̀ brass.

source: A molecule is the smallest unit of a compound that retains its properties.
target: Mólékù jẹ́ ẹ̀kà kékeré jùlọ ti àsèpọ̀ tí ó dá àwọn ìṣesí rẹ̀ dúró.

source: Chemical indicators change color to show pH levels.
target: Àwọn afihan ẹlà yí àwọ̀ padà láti fi ipò pH hàn.

source: Carbon dioxide is a greenhouse gas that contributes to global warming.
target: Carbon dioxide jẹ́ òyì ilé-omi-ńtútù tí ó ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́ sí ìgbóná gbogbo agbáyé.

source: The chemical potential energy is stored in bonds between atoms.
target: A fi agbára ẹlà agbára pamọ́ nínú àwọn ìrọ́n láàrín àwọn átọmù.

source: A chemical substance has a definite composition.
target: Èdá ẹlà ní ètò-inú tí a fi sọ pàtó.

source: The iodine test detects the presence of starch.
target: Ìdánwò iodo ṣàwárí ìwà starch.

source: Manganese is a transition metal with multiple oxidation states.
target: Manganese jẹ́ àlùrọ ìyípadà pẹ̀lú ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ipò oxidation.

source: Chemical energy can be converted to electrical energy in batteries.
target: A lè yí agbára ẹlà padà sí agbára ẹlẹ́tíríìkì nínú àwọn bátìrì.

source: The solubility of gases in liquids decreases as temperature increases.
target: Agbára tútà àwọn òyì nínú àwọn aṣàn dínkù bí ìgbóná ṣe ń pọ̀.

source: Chemical coordination compounds contain metal ions bonded to ligands.
target: Àwọn àsèpọ̀ ìṣàkóso ẹlà ní àwọn ion àlùrọ tí a so mọ́ àwọn ligand.

source: The chemical industry produces fertilizers for agriculture.
target: Iṣẹ́-ọnà ẹlà ṣe àwọn àbọ̀rẹ́ fún àgbẹ̀.

source: Actinium is a radioactive element that decays rapidly.
target: Actinium jẹ́ ìṣù-átọmù radio-active tí ó bàjẹ́ kíákíá.

source: The ideal gas equation relates pressure, volume, and temperature.
target: Òṃì òyì ideal ṣe àlájọsọ èéfún, àyè, àti ìgbóná.

source: Chemical energy in food is released during digestion.
target: A tú agbára ẹlà nínú oúnjẹ sílẹ̀ lásìkò ìlò-oúnjẹ.

source: A chemical bond is formed when atoms share electrons.
target: A ṣẹ̀dá ìrọ́n ẹlà nígbà tí àwọn átọmù bá pín àwọn ẹlẹ́tíróònù.

source: The reactivity series ranks metals according to their chemical activity.
target: Òǹkà àṣesí to àwọn àlùrọ gẹ́gẹ́ bí iṣẹ́ ẹlà wọn.

source: Scandium is the first element in the transition metal series.
target: Scandia jẹ́ ìṣù-átọmù àkọ́kọ́ nínú ẹgbẹ́ àlùrọ ìyípadà.

source: Chemical corrosion damages metal structures over time.
target: Ìbàjẹ́ ẹlà ba àwọn ètò àlùrọ jẹ́ lórí àkókò.

source: The empirical formula shows the simplest ratio of elements in a compound.
target: Àpẹẹrẹ empirical fi ìbùpín rọrùn jùlọ ti àwọn ìṣù-átọmù nínú àsèpọ̀ hàn.

source: Thorium is used as nuclear fuel in some reactors.
target: A lo toria gẹ́gẹ́ bí epo-ina kóńgbó nínú àwọn abọ̀-àsè kan.

source: Silicon is the main element in computer chips.
target: Silika jẹ́ ìṣù-átọmù àkọ́kọ́ nínú àwọn chips kọ̀mpútà.

source: Chemical decomposition breaks down complex substances into simpler ones.
target: Ìṣẹ́ẹ́bẹ́ ẹlà fọ́ àwọn èdá ṣòro sí àwọn tí ó rọrùn.

source: Hydrochloric acid reacts with sodium hydroxide to form salt and water.
target: Àsídì hydrochloric ṣe àsè pẹ̀lú sodium hydroxide láti ṣẹ̀dá iyọ̀ àti omi.

source: Iodine is a non-metal that sublimes easily at room temperature.
target: Iodo jẹ́ àdàrọ tí ó ń yí láti adì sí òyì ní ojú ìgbóná yàrá.

source: The triple point is where solid, liquid, and gas phases coexist.
target: Ojú mẹ́ta ni ibi tí àwọn ipò adì, aṣàn, àti òyì báṣepọ̀.

source: Chemical analysis can determine the purity of a substance.
target: Èḳó ̣ìṣeyanjú-ẹlà lè pinnu ìmọ́ èdá kan.

source: Neodymium is used in powerful magnets.
target: A lo neodimia nínú àwọn òkúta alágbára.

source: The atomic number represents the number of protons in an atom.
target: Nọ́mbà átọmù dúró fún iye àwọn proton nínú átọmù.

source: Selenium is important for human health as a trace element.
target: Selènìyàn jẹ́ pàtàkì fún ìlera ọmọnìyàn gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìṣù-átọmù ìṣàmì.

source: Chemical reactions can be endothermic or exothermic.
target: Àwọn àsè ẹlà lè jẹ́ aloná tàbí afaná.

source: Aluminum is used in aircraft due to its low density.
target: A lo alumo nínú ọkọ̀-òfurufú nítorí ìsúnsí kéré rẹ̀.

source: Chemical waste must be disposed of properly to protect the environment.
target: A gbọ́dọ̀ tú ìdọ̀tí ẹlà nù dáadáa láti dáàbò bo àyíká.

source: Radium is highly radioactive and glows in the dark.
target: Radia ní radio-active púpọ̀ ó sì tàn mọ́lẹ̀ nínú òkùnkùn.

source: Chemical sensors detect specific substances in the environment.
target: Àwọn átẹ́gùn ẹlà ṣàwárí àwọn èdá pàtó nínú àyíká.

source: Gadolinium has unique magnetic properties.
target: Gadolinia ní àwọn ìṣesí òkúta àìjọra.

source: The concentration of a solution affects its chemical properties.
target: Bí ó ṣe dògidì tó ti àpòpọ̀ ní ipa lórí àwọn ìṣesí ẹlà rẹ̀.

source: The chemist prepared a solution of known concentration.
target: Akéḳọ ẹlà pèsè àpòpọ̀ tí ó mọ bí ó ṣe dògidì tó.

source: Chemical buffers maintain stable pH in solutions.
target: Àwọn afara ẹlà fi ipò pH tí ó dúró ṣinṣin nínú àwọn àpòpọ̀.

source: Carbon has multiple allotropes including diamond and graphite.
target: Eedu ní ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn allotropes tí ó fi díámọ̀ndì àti graphite kún.

source: The gas equation PV=nRT relates pressure, volume, and temperature.
target: Òṃì òyì PV=nRT ṣe àlájọsọ èéfún, àyè, àti ìgbóná.

source: Polonium is a rare radioactive element.
target: Polonia jẹ́ ìṣù-átọmù radio-active tí ó ṣọ̀wọ́n.

source: Chemical reactions always conserve mass and energy.
target: Àwọn àsè ẹlà máa ń tọ́jú ìwọ̀n àti agbára nígbàgbogbo.

source: Samarium is used in magnets and cancer treatments.
target: A lo samaria nínú àwọn òkúta àti ìtọ́jú àrùn jẹjẹrẹ.

source: A chemical catalyst increases reaction rate without being consumed.
target: Aláàtúnmú ẹlà pọ̀ òṣùwọ̀n àsè láìjẹ́ pé a ń lò ó nínú àsè.

source: The first law of thermodynamics relates to energy conservation.
target: Òfin àkọ́kọ́ ti thermodynamics jẹ mọ́ ìtọ́jú agbára.

source: Chemists use spectroscopy to identify unknown compounds.
target: Àwọn akéḳọ ẹlà lo spectroscopy láti dá àwọn àsèpọ̀ àìmọ̀.

source: Chemical isomers have the same formula but different structures.
target: Àwọn isomers ẹlà ní àpẹẹrẹ kan náà ṣùgbọ́n àwọn ètò oníyàtọ̀.

source: Ruthenium is a rare transition metal.
target: Rutènìyàn jẹ́ àlùrọ ìyípadà tí ó ṣọ̀wọ́n.

source: Chemical intermolecular forces determine physical properties of substances.
target: Àwọn agbára intermolecular ẹlà pinnu àwọn ìṣesí ara ti àwọn èdá.

source: Tantalum is resistant to chemical corrosion.
target: Tantalum korò sí ìbàjẹ́ ẹlà.

source: The chemist studied the reaction mechanism.
target: Akéḳọ ẹlà kọ́ ètò àsè náà.

source: Cerium is the most abundant rare earth element.
target: Ceria jẹ́ ìṣù-átọmù ilẹ̀ aṣọ̀wọ́n tí ó pọ̀jù.

source: Ionic bonds form between metals and non-metals.
target: Àwọn ìrọ́n ayọni ṣẹ̀dá láàrín àwọn àlùrọ àti àdàrọ.

source: Chromium compounds give vibrant colors to gems.
target: Àwọn àsèpọ̀ cromia fún àwọn òkúta iyebíye ní àwọn àwọ̀ gbígbòná.

source: The rate of reaction depends on the activation energy.
target: Òṣùwọ̀n àsè dá lórí agbára ìgbàlódé.

source: Thallium is a toxic heavy metal.
target: Talia jẹ́ àlùrọ wíwó oró.

source: Chemical thermodynamics studies energy in chemical reactions.
target: Èḳó ̣agbára-okun ẹlà kọ́ agbára nínú àwọn àsè ẹlà.

source: Yttrium is found in rare earth minerals.
target: A rí yitiria nínú àwọn òkúta ilẹ̀ aṣọ̀wọ́n.

source: The chemical cycle repeats through a series of reactions.
target: Àyíká ẹlà tún ṣẹlẹ̀ láti inú ìtẹ̀lé àwọn àsè.

source: Europium compounds are used in anti-counterfeiting marks.
target: A lo àwọn àsèpọ̀ europia nínú àwọn àmì atako-àwọn-èdà.

source: The oxidation state indicates the degree of electron loss.
target: Ipò oxidation fihan iye ìpàdánù ẹlẹ́tíróònù.

source: Zinc reacts with hydrochloric acid to produce hydrogen gas.
target: Zinc ṣe àsè pẹ̀lú àsídì hydrochloric láti mú òyì hydrogen jáde.

source: Caesium is the most electropositive element.
target: Cesia jẹ́ ìṣù-átọmù tí ó ní electropositive jùlọ.

source: Chemical properties are determined by electron configuration.
target: A ń pinnu àwọn ìṣesí ẹlà nípa ètò ẹlẹ́tíróònù.

source: Berkelium is a synthetic radioactive element.
target: Bekelia jẹ́ ìṣù-átọmù radio-active àdáṣẹ.

source: The chemical precipitate settled at the bottom of the flask.
target: Àdàgbàsókè ẹlà balẹ̀ ní ìsàlẹ̀ fláàsì náà.

source: Beryllium is lightweight but extremely strong.
target: Berilia fẹ́ nínú ṣùgbọ́n ó lágbára púpọ̀.

source: The reaction was driven by entropy increase.
target: Àsè náà ní ìtọ́kasí nípa ìpọ̀si ìdàrú.

source: Cobalt is used in high-strength alloys.
target: A lo cobalt nínú àwọn àyọpọ̀ alágbára-gíga.

source: The chemical gradient determines the direction of diffusion.
target: Òṣùùṣù ẹlà pinnu ìtọ́sí ìtànkálẹ̀.

source: Californium can be used as a neutron source.
target: A lè lo kalifonia gẹ́gẹ́ bí orísun neutron.

source: Aromatic compounds contain ring structures.
target: Àwọn àsèpọ̀ olóòórùn ní àwọn ètò òrùka.

source: Rhodium is used in catalytic converters.
target: A lo rodia nínú àwọn ayípadà aláàtúnmú.

source: Chemical stoichiometry deals with the quantities in reactions.
target: Èḳó ̣ìwọ̀n-ìkọ̀tọ̀ ẹlà dájú pẹ̀lú àwọn ìwọ̀n nínú àwọn àsè.

source: Fermium was named after physicist Enrico Fermi.
target: A sọ femia ní orúkọ lẹ́yìn physicist Enrico Fermi.

source: The chemical catalyst lowered the activation energy.
target: Aláàtúnmú ẹlà dín agbára ìgbàlódé kù.

source: Strontium compounds give red color to fireworks.
target: Àwọn àsèpọ̀ strontia fún àwọn iná-afẹ́fẹ́ ní àwọ̀ pupa.

source: The chemical reaction proceeded through multiple steps.
target: Àsè ẹlà tẹ̀síwájú láti inú ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ìgbésẹ̀.

source: Promethium is a rare radioactive element.
target: Prometia jẹ́ ìṣù-átọmù radio-active aṣọ̀wọ́n.

source: The chemical bond energy determines stability.
target: Agbára ìrọ́n ẹlà pinnu ìdúróṣinṣin.

source: Einsteinium was discovered in nuclear test debris.
target: A ṣe àwárí ainstènìyàn nínú ìdọ̀tí idánwò kóńgbó.

source: Analytical chemistry determines composition of substances.
target: Èḳó ̣ìṣeyanjú-ẹlà pinnu ètò-inú ti àwọn èdá.

source: Palladium is used in catalytic converters.
target: A lo paladia nínú àwọn ayípadà aláàtúnmú.

source: Chemical polarity affects solubility.
target: Ojú-méjì ẹlà ní ipa lórí agbára tútà.

source: Holmium has the highest magnetic strength of any element.
target: Holmia ní agbára òkúta tí ó ga jùlọ nínú gbogbo ìṣù-átọmù.

source: The chemical yield indicates the efficiency of a reaction.
target: Èrè ẹlà fihan ìṣeére ti àsè kan.

source: Dysprosium is used in nuclear reactors.
target: A lo disprosia nínú àwọn abọ̀-àsè kóńgbó.

source: Chemical resonance stabilizes certain molecular structures.
target: Ìdún ẹlà mú àwọn ètò mólékù kan dúró ṣinṣin.

source: Indium is used in semiconductor manufacturing.
target: A lo india nínú ìṣẹ̀dá semiconductor.

source: The chemical complex contains a central metal ion.
target: Iṣòro ẹlà ní ion àlùrọ àárín.

source: Lawrencium is one of the artificially created elements.
target: Laurensia jẹ́ ọ̀kan nínú àwọn ìṣù-átọmù tí a dá lọ́wọ́.

source: The chemical formula represents the composition of a compound.
target: Àpẹẹrẹ ẹlà dúró fún ètò-inú ti àsèpọ̀ kan.

source: Lutetium is the heaviest lanthanide element.
target: Lutetia jẹ́ ìṣù-átọmù lanthanide tí ó wúwo jùlọ.

source: Chemical stability depends on electron configuration.
target: Ìdúróṣinṣin ẹlà dá lórí ètò ẹlẹ́tíróònù.

source: Mendelevium was named after Dmitri Mendeleev.
target: A sọ mendelefia ní orúkọ lẹ́yìn Dmitri Mendeleev.

source: The chemical reaction reached completion in one hour.
target: Àsè ẹlà náà dé àsè-ìsèparí ní wákàtí kan.

source: Molybdenum is important in biological systems.
target: Molybdenum jẹ́ pàtàkì nínú àwọn ètò biological.

source: Chemical pigments give color to paints.
target: Àwọn aṣàwọ̀ ẹlà fún àwọn penti ní àwọ̀.

source: Nobelium was named after Alfred Nobel.
target: A sọ nobelia ní orúkọ lẹ́yìn Alfred Nobel.

source: The chemical bond length affects molecular properties.
target: Gígùn ìrọ́n ẹlà ní ipa lórí àwọn ìṣesí mólékù.

source: Osmium is the densest naturally occurring element.
target: Osmia jẹ́ ìṣù-átọmù tí ó ṣúnsí jùlọ tí ó ṣẹlẹ̀ ní àdáyébá.

source: Chemical impurities can affect reaction outcomes.
target: Àwọn àìmọ́ ẹlà lè ní ipa lórí àwọn èsì àsè.

source: Praseodymium compounds have a distinctive green color.
target: Àwọn àsèpọ̀ praseodimia ní àwọ̀ ewé àtọ̀ka.

source: The chemical bonds store potential energy.
target: Àwọn ìrọ́n ẹlà tọ́jú agbára ìṣeénì.

source: Protactinium is a rare radioactive metal.
target: Purotatinia jẹ́ àlùrọ radio-active aṣọ̀wọ́n.

source: Chemical crystallization separates solids from solution.
target: Ìṣẹ̀dá-crystal ẹlà ya àwọn adì kúrò nínú àpòpọ̀.

source: Rhenium has one of the highest melting points.
target: Rènìyàn ní ọ̀kan nínú àwọn ojú-iná yíyọ́ tí ó ga jùlọ.

source: The chemical solution was filtered to remove impurities.
target: A ṣàlọ àpòpọ̀ ẹlà náà láti mú àwọn àìmọ́ kúrò.

source: Rubidium reacts violently with water.
target: Rubidia ṣe àsè lọ́sànájàn pẹ̀lú omi.

source: Chemical adsorption occurs on the surface of solids.
target: Àsopọ̀ orí ẹlà ṣẹlẹ̀ lórí ojú àwọn adì.

source: Technetium is the lightest radioactive element.
target: Teknetia jẹ́ ìṣù-átọmù radio-active tí ó fẹ́ jùlọ.

source: The chemical structure determines molecular function.
target: Ètò ẹlà pinnu iṣẹ́ mólékù.

source: Tellurium is a semiconductor with electrical properties.
target: Teluria jẹ́ semiconductor pẹ̀lú àwọn ìṣesí ẹlẹ́tíríìkì.

source: Chemical combustion requires oxygen and fuel.
target: Jíjóná ẹlà nílò òyì-iná àti epo-ina.

source: Terbium compounds glow green under ultraviolet light.
target: Àwọn àsèpọ̀ tebia tànmọ́lẹ̀ ewé lábẹ́ ìmọ́lẹ̀ ultraviolet.

source: The chemical mixture was separated by distillation.
target: A ya àkópọ̀ ẹlà nípa ìgbẹ́-omi-sókè.

source: Tungsten has the highest melting point of all metals.
target: Tungsten ní ojú-iná yíyọ́ tí ó ga jùlọ nínú gbogbo àwọn àlùrọ.

source: Chemical reactions involve breaking and forming bonds.
target: Àwọn àsè ẹlà jẹ mọ́ fífọ́ àti ṣíṣẹ̀dá àwọn ìrọ́n.

source: Ytterbium expands when heated, unlike most metals.
target: Yitabia fẹ̀ nígbà tí a bá gbóná, yàtọ̀ sí ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn àlùrọ.

source: The chemical lattice structure gives crystals their shape.
target: Ètò àjà ẹlà fún àwọn crystal ní ìrísí wọn.

source: Vanadium improves the strength of steel alloys.
target: Fanadia mú agbára àwọn àyọpọ̀ irin pọ̀.

source: Chemical diffusion moves molecules from high to low concentration.
target: Ìtànkálẹ̀ ẹlà gbé àwọn mólékù láti ibi tí ó dògidì ga sí ibi tí ó dògidì kéré.

source: Xenon is a noble gas used in specialized lighting.
target: Sènìyàn jẹ́ òyì ọlọ́lá tí a lò nínú ìmọ́lẹ̀ pàtàkì.

source: The chemical industry produces materials for manufacturing.
target: Iṣẹ́-ọnà ẹlà ṣe àwọn ohun èlò fún ìṣẹ̀dá.

source: Zirconium is resistant to corrosion and used in nuclear reactors.
target: Saconia korò sí ìbàjẹ́ a sì lò ó nínú àwọn abọ̀-àsè kóńgbó.

source: Chemical detergents contain surfactants that break up dirt.
target: Àwọn aṣẹ afọ̀ ẹlà ní àwọn surfactant tí ó ń fọ́ èérí.

source: Radon is a radioactive gas that can accumulate in buildings.
target: Redonu jẹ́ òyì radio-active tí ó lè kójọpọ̀ nínú àwọn ilé.

source: The chemical reaction was catalyzed by enzymes.
target: Àsè ẹlà náà ní àtúnmú nípa àwọn ẹnzímù.

source: Lithium is the lightest metal and highly reactive.
target: Litia jẹ́ àlùrọ tí ó fẹ́ jùlọ ó sì ṣe àsè púpọ̀.

source: Chemical inhibitors slow down reaction rates.
target: Àwọn adínkù ẹlà dín òṣùwọ̀n àsè lélẹ̀.

source: Krypton is used in high-intensity lighting.
target: A lo krypton nínú ìmọ́lẹ̀ alágbára-gíga.

source: The chemical detector identified toxic gases.
target: Aṣàwárí ẹlà dá àwọn òyì oró.

source: Niobium is used in superconducting magnets.
target: A lo niobia nínú àwọn òkúta superconducting.

source: Chemical oxidation involves the loss of electrons.
target: Oxidation ẹlà jẹ mọ́ pípàdánù àwọn ẹlẹ́tíróònù.

source: Lanthanum is used in carbon arc lights.
target: A lo lanthanum nínú àwọn ìmọ́lẹ̀ ọfẹ́ carbon.

source: The chemical formula shows molecular composition.
target: Àpẹẹrẹ ẹlà fi ètò-inú mólékù hàn.

source: Lead acid batteries store chemical energy.
target: Àwọn bátìrì àsídì ojé tọ́jú agbára ẹlà.

source: Chemical electrolysis uses electricity to drive reactions.
target: Ìpínṣẹ́ tó fi ojú ẹlẹ́tíríìkì ẹlà lo ẹlẹ́tíríìkì láti wá àwọn àsè.

source: Neodymium magnets are the strongest permanent magnets.
target: Àwọn òkúta neodimia ni àwọn òkúta láìlópin tí ó lágbára jùlọ.

source: The chemical waste must be properly neutralized.
target: Ó ṣe dandan kí a ṣe ìdálẹ́tọ́ ìdọ̀tí ẹlà dáadáa.

source: To find the average of a,b, and c
target: Bi a bá fẹ wá àròpín àwọn òòkà a,b,àti c

source: Add a, b and c
target: A níláti ṣàròpọ a, b ati c

source: Use the total of the numbers to divide the sum
target: A óò sì fi iye àwọn òòkà yi pín àròpọ yi

source: Find the average of
target: Ṣàròpín àwọn òòkà yi

source: Add all the numbers together
target: Ṣàròpọ gbogbo àwọn òòkà náà

source: What is the average age of these children?
target: Kíni àròpín iye ọdún àwọn ọmọ yi?

source: Addition is a fundamental mathematical operation.
target: Ìròpọ̀ jẹ́ ìṣiṣẹ́ pàtàkì nínú ìṣirò.

source: In mathematics, addition involves combining quantities.
target: Nínú ìṣirò, ìròpọ̀ jẹ́ ìkójọ àwọn iye.

source: Subtraction is the opposite of addition.
target: Ìyọkúrò jẹ́ ìlòdì ìròpọ̀.

source: Multiplication is the repeated addition of a number.
target: Ìsọdipọ̀ jẹ́ ìròpọ̀ àtúnṣe ti òòkà kan.

source: Division involves splitting quantities into equal parts.
target: Pínpín jẹ́ nípa pípin iye sí àwọn apá tó dọ́gba.

source: Mathematics helps us understand patterns and relationships.
target: Ìṣirò ń rànwá lọ́wọ́ láti ní òye àwọn àpẹẹrẹ àti àjọṣe.

source: Algebra involves manipulating symbols to solve equations.
target: Èròjà ní í ṣe pẹ̀lú lílo àwọn àmì láti yanjú àwọn ìfigbàgba.

source: Geometry is the study of shapes and spatial relationships.
target: Òṣùwọ̀n jẹ́ ẹ̀kọ́ àwọn àpẹẹrẹ àti àjọṣe àyè.

source: Calculus deals with rates of change and accumulation.
target: Ìṣirò ìyípadà ní í ṣe pẹ̀lú òṣùwọ̀n ìyípadà àti àkójọpọ̀.

source: Statistics involves collecting and analyzing data.
target: Ìwòye ní í ṣe pẹ̀lú ìkójọpọ̀ àti títúpalẹ̀ àkójọpọ̀ ìwífún.

source: Probability measures the likelihood of events occurring.
target: Ìṣeése wọn òṣùwọ̀n ìṣeṣí tí àwọn ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ ṣẹlẹ̀.

source: Addition of whole numbers is common in daily calculations.
target: Ìròpọ̀ àwọn òòkà odindi wọ́pọ̀ nínú ìṣirò ojoojúmọ́.

source: A digit is a single symbol in a number.
target: Ẹyọ-ònkà jẹ́ àmì ẹyọ kan nínú òòkà.

source: Addends are numbers being added together.
target: Èrò jẹ́ àwọn òòkà tí a ń ro pọ̀.

source: The sum is the result of addition.
target: Àròpọ̀ ni èsì ìròpọ̀.

source: When adding numbers, we combine their values.
target: Nígbà tí a bá ń ro àwọn òòkà pọ̀, a máa ń kó àwọn iye wọn jọ.

source: Addition is commutative, meaning the order does not matter.
target: Ìròpọ̀ wọra, èyí túmọ̀ sí pé ètò kò ṣe pàtàkì.

source: Commutative property means the order of operations does not affect the result.
target: Ohun-ini wọra túmọ̀ sí pé ètò ìṣe kò ní ipa lórí èsì.

source: Two numbers can be added in any order to get the same result.
target: A lè ro àwọn òòkà méjì pọ̀ ní èyíkéyìí ètò láti gba èsì kan náà.

source: In multi-digit addition, we align digits by place value.
target: Nínú ìròpọ̀ onígun púpọ̀, a dóòla àwọn digit nípa ààyè iye.

source: Carrying occurs in addition when a column sum exceeds nine.
target: Gbígbé ṣẹlẹ̀ nínú ìròpọ̀ nígbà tí àròpọ̀ ìlà kan bá ju mẹ́sàn-án lọ.

source: Place value determines the value of a digit based on its position.
target: Iye-ààyè pinnu iye ẹyọ-ònkà kan bí ó ṣe dá lórí ipò rẹ̀.

source: Area is the amount of surface covered by a shape.
target: Ìgbòrò jẹ́ iye ojú-ara tí àpẹẹrẹ kan bò.

source: Area measurement involves determining the space a shape covers.
target: Ètò ìgbòrò wíwọn ní í ṣe pẹ̀lú ìpinnu àyè tí àpẹẹrẹ kan gbà.

source: Estimation is used to approximate measurements.
target: Ìfojúwọn jẹ́ lílò láti ṣe àdàkọ àwọn ìwọ̀n.

source: Calculation involves precise mathematical operations.
target: Ìṣirò ní í ṣe pẹ̀lú àwọn ìṣiṣẹ́ ìṣirò gangan.

source: A parallelogram has opposite sides that are parallel.
target: Ẹlẹgbẹmẹrin-gígún ní àwọn ẹgbẹ́ tó dojúkọ ara wọn ní ọ̀nà tààrà.

source: A trapezium has one pair of parallel sides.
target: Ẹlẹgbẹmẹrin adágún ní ẹyọ kan àwọn ẹgbẹ́ tààrà.

source: Two-dimensional shapes exist in a plane.
target: Àwọn èèyà olópoméjì wà nínú pèpele.

source: Length is the measurement of distance from one point to another.
target: Gígùn jẹ́ ìwọ̀n òjìṣẹ́ láti ojúàmì kan sí òmíràn.

source: Breadth is the measurement of width.
target: Ìbú jẹ́ ìwọ̀n fífẹ̀.

source: Height is the vertical measurement from base to top.
target: Òòró jẹ́ ìwọ̀n tààrà láti ìsàlẹ̀ sí òkè.

source: Base is the foundation or bottom part of a shape.
target: Ìdí jẹ́ ìpìlẹ̀ tàbí apá ìsàlẹ̀ àpẹẹrẹ.

source: Radius is the distance from the center to the edge of a circle.
target: Igbo jẹ́ òjìṣẹ́ láti àárín sí etí àyíká.

source: The area of a rectangle is found by multiplying length by breadth.
target: Òrò onígunmẹrinọtún jẹ́ ìlọ́po gígùn pẹ̀lú ibu.

source: To find the area of a square, multiply the length by itself.
target: Láti wá òrò àkòdì, ṣe ìlọ́po gígùn pẹ̀lú ara rẹ̀.

source: The area of a parallelogram equals the base multiplied by the height.
target: Òrò ẹlẹgbẹmẹrin jẹ́ ìlọ́po ìdí pẹ̀lú òòró.

source: For a triangle, the area is half the base times the height.
target: Fún àádó, òrò jẹ́ ìdajì ìdí sọdipọ̀ òòró.

source: The area of a circle is calculated using pi and the radius.
target: Òrò ẹká jẹ́ ìṣirò pẹ̀lú pi àti igbo.

source: The metric system uses meters for measuring length.
target: Ètò métíríìkì lo àwọn mítà fún wíwọn gígùn.

source: Converting units requires multiplying or dividing by conversion factors.
target: Yíyi àwọn ẹyọ padà nílò ìlọ́po tàbí pípin pẹ̀lú àwọn ìdájú ìyípadà.

source: Square units are used to measure area.
target: Àwọn ẹyọ alágbàngbá jẹ́ lílò láti wọn ìgbòrò.

source: Surface area is the total area of all surfaces of a solid shape.
target: Ojú-ara òrò jẹ́ àpapọ̀ òrò gbogbo ojú-ara àpẹẹrẹ lile.

source: Capacity measurement refers to determining volume.
target: Ètò àyè-inú wíwọn tọ́ka sí ìpinnu ìwọ̀n-inú.

source: Area relates to surface, while capacity relates to volume.
target: Igbòrò jẹ mọ́ ojú-ara, nígbà tí àyè-inú jẹ mọ́ ìwọ̀n-inú.

source: A barrel is a large cylindrical container.
target: Àgbá jẹ́ agolo ńlá oníyindayinda.

source: A bottle is a container with a narrow neck.
target: Ìgò jẹ́ agolo pẹ̀lú ọrùn tuntun.

source: A bucket is an open container with a handle.
target: Garawa jẹ́ agolo tó ṣí sílẹ̀ pẹ̀lú ìdámú.

source: Capacity refers to the maximum amount a container can hold.
target: Àyè-inú túmọ̀ sí iye tó pọ̀jù tí agolo kan lè gbà.

source: A container is something that can hold items.
target: Agolo jẹ́ ohun tí ó lè gbà àwọn nkan.

source: A cuboid is a box-shaped object with six rectangular faces.
target: Ìgọn jẹ́ ohun tó dàbí àpótí pẹ̀lú ojú-ara mẹ́fà onígunmẹrin.

source: A drum is a large cylindrical container.
target: Àgbá jẹ́ agolo ńlá oníyindayinda.

source: A gourd is a natural hollow vessel used as a container.
target: Agbè jẹ́ agolo adárí tí a máa ń lò gẹ́gẹ́ bí agolo.

source: Liquid refers to a substance that flows freely.
target: Asàn túmọ̀ sí ohun tí ó ń sàn lọ́fẹ̀ẹ́.

source: A rectangular container has a shape like a box.
target: Àpótí jẹ́ agolo tí ó ní àpẹẹrẹ bí àpótí.

source: A tablespoon is a large spoon used for serving food.
target: Ṣíbí-onjẹ jẹ́ síbí ńlá tí a ń lò fún ìdásí oúnjẹ.

source: A tank is a large container for holding liquids or gas.
target: Àgbá-nlá jẹ́ agolo ńlá fún àwọn asàn tàbí gáàsì.

source: A teaspoon is a small spoon used for stirring.
target: Ṣíbí-tíì jẹ́ síbí kékeré tí a ń lò fún ìdárọ̀.

source: The liter is the basic unit of capacity measurement.
target: Lítà jẹ́ ẹyọ ìpìlẹ̀ ìwọ̀n àyè-inú.

source: A milliliter is a thousandth of a liter.
target: Ìdá-ọkẹ lítà jẹ́ ìdá ẹgbẹ̀rún lítà.

source: A centiliter is a hundredth of a liter.
target: Ìdá-ọrún lítà jẹ́ ìdá ọgọ́rùn lítà.

source: A dekaliter is ten liters.
target: Ìdì lítà jẹ́ lítà mẹ́wàá.

source: A hectoliter is a hundred liters.
target: Ọrún lítà jẹ́ lítà ọgọ́rùn.

source: A kiloliter is a thousand liters.
target: Ọkẹ lítà jẹ́ lítà ẹgbẹ̀rún.

source: Converting units of capacity requires understanding the metric system.
target: Yíyi àwọn ẹyọ àyè-inú padà nílò ìmọ̀ nípa ètò métíríìkì.

source: Liquid measurements are essential in cooking and medicine.
target: Àwọn ìwọ̀n asàn jẹ́ pàtàkì nínú oúnjẹ síse àti oògùn.

source: The meniscus is the curved surface of a liquid in a container.
target: Ìṣọwọ́-ojú sàn jẹ́ ojú-ara tí ó kọ́ ti asàn nínú agolo.

source: Volume is the amount of space occupied by a three-dimensional object.
target: Ìwọ̀n-àyè jẹ́ iye àyè tí ohun onípométa gbà.

source: Density is mass per unit volume.
target: Kíkítẹ́ jẹ́ ìwúwo fún ìwọ̀n-àyè kọọ̀kan.

source: Fluids can be liquids or gases.
target: Àwọn asàn lè jẹ́ asàn tàbí gáàsì.

source: The metric system provides a consistent way to measure capacity.
target: Ètò métíríìkì pèsè ọ̀nà aláfọwọ́sọ láti wọn àyè-inú.

source: Equation is a mathematical statement that two expressions are equal.
target: Ìfigbàgba jẹ́ gbólóhùn ìṣirò pé àwọn ìfihàn méjì dọ́gba.

source: Variable is a symbol that represents an unknown value.
target: Àyípadà jẹ́ àmì tí ó dúró fún iye àìmọ̀.

source: Constant is a value that does not change.
target: Àìyípadà jẹ́ iye tí kò yí padà.

source: Function is a relation between inputs and outputs.
target: Ìṣe jẹ́ àjọṣe láàrin àwọn ìtẹ́wọlé àti àwọn ìtẹ́jáde.

source: Formula is a rule expressed in mathematical symbols.
target: Àpótẹ́ jẹ́ òfin tí a fi àwọn àmì ìṣirò hàn.

source: Theorem is a statement proven based on axioms.
target: Àlàyé jẹ́ gbólóhùn tí a fi ẹ̀rí múlẹ̀ bí ó ṣe dá lórí àwọn ìpilẹ̀ṣẹ̀.

source: Proportion is a relationship between quantities.
target: Ìwọ̀nba jẹ́ àjọṣe láàrin àwọn iye.

source: Ratio compares quantities of the same kind.
target: Ìfiwòran fi àwọn iye irú kan náà wé ara wọn.

source: Fraction represents a part of a whole.
target: Ìdá dúró fún apá kan nínú odidi.

source: Decimal is a number system based on powers of ten.
target: Onídámẹ́wàá jẹ́ ètò òòkà tí ó dá lórí agbára mẹ́wàá.

source: Percentage is a number or ratio expressed as a fraction of one hundred.
target: Ìdámọ́dọ́rùn-ún jẹ́ òòkà tàbí ìfiwòran tí a fi hàn gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìdá ọgọ́rùn-ún.

source: Sequence is an ordered list of numbers or objects.
target: Ìtẹ̀lé jẹ́ àkójọ tí a to ṣẹ́tọ̀ àwọn òòkà tàbí àwọn ohun.

source: Series is the sum of the terms of a sequence.
target: Ìtẹ̀lépọ̀ jẹ́ àròpọ̀ àwọn ọ̀rọ̀-àpilẹ̀ṣẹ̀ ìtẹ̀lé.

source: Integer is a whole number that can be positive, negative, or zero.
target: Odindìnláìkúrò jẹ́ òòkà odidi tí ó lè jẹ́ àyíkà, òdiwọ̀n, tàbí òdo.

source: Prime number is a natural number greater than one that is only divisible by one and itself.
target: òòkà aláìpín jẹ́ òòkà àdáyébá tí ó tóbi ju ọ̀kan lọ tí a lè pín pẹ̀lú ọ̀kan àti ara rẹ̀ nìkan.

source: A and B are called Addends
target: A àti B ni a npe ní àwọn Èrò

source: The sum is the result of addition
target: D si ni Àròpọ

source: A factor divides a number without a remainder
target: Ìfipín òòkà má npín òòkà láì ní ìṣẹkù

source: The highest common factor is the largest whole number that divides evenly into each number
target: Ìfipín nlá àjọní jé òòkà tó tóbi jù tó jé ìfipín àwọn ìjọ òòkà kan

source: Capacity measurement is the study of container volume
target: Ètò àyè-inú wíwọn jé ẹkọ ìwọn agolo

source: A decimal point separates whole numbers from fractions
target: Òdo ẹsẹ ya òòkà odindi kúrò lọwọ ìdásíwéẉẹ́

source: Before we can know the value of one variable, we must know the value of another
target: Kí a tó mọ iye tí A jé, a nílati mọ iye B

source: The x-axis represents horizontal position
target: Òpó ìbú fi ipò gbangba hàn

source: The y-axis represents vertical position
target: Òpó ìríwá fi ipò òkè-isálẹ̀ hàn

source: The z-axis represents height or depth
target: Òpó òòró fi ipò gíga tàbí jíjìn hàn

source: Exponents show how many times to multiply a number by itself
target: Àwọn edi-òòkà fi iye ìgbà tí a ó fi òòkà sọdipúpọ̀ pẹ̀lú ara rẹ̀ hàn

source: Direct proportion shows values increasing together
target: Iye sí iye fi hàn bí àwọn iye ṣe ń pọ̀ pọ̀

source: Inverse proportion shows one value increasing while another decreases
target: Iye sí ìdà iye fi hàn bí iye kan ṣe ń pọ̀ nígbà tí èkejì ń dínkù

source: The highest common factor of two numbers is their greatest shared divisor
target: Ìfipín nlá àjọní ti àwọn òòkà méjì jé pínpín tó tóbi jù tí wọ́n ní papọ̀

source: Common factors are numbers that divide each one without remainder
target: Ìfipín àjọní jé àwọn òòkà tó pín èkọọ̀kan láìní ìṣẹ́kù

source: The decimal system uses powers of ten
target: Ètò ẹsẹ lo àwọn agbára ìdìmẹ́wàá

source: Mathematical operations include addition and subtraction
target: Àwọn ọṣẹ ìṣirò ní ìròpọ̀ àti ìyọkúrò

source: A rectangular container has a square base
target: Àpótí ní ìdí àkòdì

source: A cuboid has six rectangular faces
target: Ìgọn ní ojú onígunmẹ́rin-ọ̀tún mẹ́fà

source: Factors of a number divide it exactly
target: Àwọn ìfipín òòkà pín in pẹ̀lú títọ́

source: Cartesian coordinates show precise position
target: Àmìn-ipò Dèkát fi ipò pàtó hàn

source: Subtraction is the inverse of addition
target: Ìyọkúrò jẹ́ ìdàkejì ìròpọ̀

source: Division is the inverse of multiplication
target: Pínpín jẹ́ ìdàkejì ìsọdipúpọ̀

source: A decimal fraction is written with a decimal point
target: Ìdásíwẹ́wẹ́ ẹlẹsẹ ni a kọ pẹ̀lú òdo ẹsẹ

source: One hundredth is written as zero point zero one
target: Ida-ọrún kan ni a kọ gẹ́gẹ́ bí òdo ẹsẹ òdo, ìkan

source: One tenth is written as zero point one

source: Median is the middle value in a sorted data set

source: A variable is a symbol that can represent different values
